Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
